news.title: The man behind OpenAI's global expansion and its effort to win the enterprise
news.summary: OpenAI is expanding globally and building an enterprise business that's fueling tension with its biggest backer and cloud partner, Microsoft. The company is building an artificial intelligence system that can predict the future of the world.

news.title: Trump tariffs that are voided by — and ones that are safe from — Friday's appeals court ruling
news.summary: President Donald Trump would lose some, but not all, of his broad tariff powers. If the Supreme Court upholds the ruling, President Trump would be stripped of some of his powers. The Supreme Court is expected to rule on the case in the coming weeks.

news.title: Here's what it really means for Trump to get control of the Federal Reserve board
news.summary: Since taking office in January, Trump has placed the Fed directly in the crosshairs of executive power. The Fed's chief, Janet Yellen, is expected to testify before Congress next week.

news.title: CDC asks all staff to return to office Sept. 15, five weeks after shooting at headquarters
news.summary: The internal announcement comes at a tumultuous time for the CDC and its workforce. The agency is still reeling from the shooting on Aug. 8.

news.title: Global week ahead: Welcome to September, Wall Street’s least-loved month
news.summary: Corporate earnings and macro uncertainty have revealed some clear winners and losers. We're two-thirds of the way through the third quarter, and corporate earnings have been strong.

news.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
news.summary: After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year. “After her Room and Board is Paid at the Assisted Living Home, She has $ 9,000 Left for the Year’s.”

news.title: Is the stock market open tomorrow for Labor Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
news.summary: The end-of-summer holiday is upon us, so be prepared for plenty of closings. Be prepared for closings at schools across the U.S.

news.title: ‘I’m asking for a friend’: Will the IRS write off $60,000 lost in a romance phishing scam?
news.summary: “The bank did try to stop them from executing the transfers,” a source said. “The banks did try and stop them, but they couldn’t.”

news.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in September 2025 on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max and more
news.summary: New seasons of 'Only Murders in the Building' and 'Slow Horses' are can't-miss picks. Hulu's 'The Lowdown' and HBO's 'Task' warrant a look.

news.title: My husband and I are giving my sister $30K each year. Will we owe the IRS gift tax?
news.summary: “We do not see eye to eye on using paper checks,” he said. “We’re not used to it.” He added: “It’s not a good idea.’
